attributes.action: Give Simon Cowe a Knight Hood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Simon Cowe has contributed to Music Entertaiment and the UK. Eployment all over the world. 
Simon has made it possible to show off Britan's talent to the rest of the world. and the rest of the world to us.
He's honest to the point and direct.
If you are a fan of any artis or of Simon Cowe and you think that he deserves a nighthood then please sign this petition and put if to the public vote im looking for over 1 million votes.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
